select num,title,content,love,singo,DATE_FORMAT(regdate, "%Y년 %m월 %d일 %H:%i") regdate,id,name,save_name from (select p.photo_num num,p.title title,p.content content,p.love love,p.singo singo,p.regdate regdate,h.id id,m.name name,pro.save_name save_name from member m join hompy h on h.id=m.id join (select * from ( select hompy_num,save_name from profile order by hompy_num, regdate desc ) a group by a.hompy_num) pro on h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num join photo_folder pf on pf.hompy_num = h.hompy_num join photo p on pf.photo_folder_num = p.photo_folder_num where p.secret='전체공개' union select d.diary_num num,d.title title,d.content content,d.love love,d.singo singo,d.regdate regdate,h.id id,m.name name,pro.save_name save_name from member m join hompy h on h.id=m.id join (select * from ( select hompy_num,save_name from profile order by hompy_num, regdate desc ) a group by a.hompy_num) pro on h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num join diary_folder df on df.hompy_num = h.hompy_num join diary d on df.diary_folder_num = d.diary_folder_num where d.type='전체공개') a
order by a.regdate desc limit #{startrow},#{endrow}
SELECT pro.save_name save_name FROM hompy h JOIN profile pro ON h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num WHERE id=#{value} order by regdate desc limit 0,1
